content.query:
USE Database1;
GO

CREATE VIEW Usuarios_vista AS
SELECT * 
FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'brutos/userid-profile.tsv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'datalakegen2grupo11',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', 
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='\t', 
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    )
WITH (
    [id] VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,
    [gender] VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,
    [age] NUMERIC,
    [country]  VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2,
    [registered]  VARCHAR (255) COLLATE Latin1_General_BIN2
) AS [r];
